description: Structured information on a used license.
label: License
name: License

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam._instruction: Enter the full name of this license.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.label: Full name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/fullNam.name: fullName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/legalCo._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the legal code of this license.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/legalCo.description: Type of legislation that claims to cover the law system (complete or parts) as it existed at the time the code was enacted.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/legalCo.label: Legal code
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/legalCo.name: legalCode

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa._instruction: Enter a short name (or alias) for this license that could be used as a shortened display title (e.g., for web services with too little space to display the full name).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.label: Short name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/shortNa.name: shortName

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/webpage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to webpages related to this license (e.g., a homepage).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/webpage.description: Hypertext document (block of information) found on the World Wide Web.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/webpage.label: Webpage
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/webpage.name: webpage
